post.text: Live from Charlotte: President Obama hits the trail with Hillary for the first time in this campaign.

comment.author: Courtney
comment.text: What has Hillary done for this country and what can you expect her to do as President? She is a LIAR like Obama. People have died because of her! This country will collapse under Hillary! She will finish what Obama started!!!!!!

replies.author: Ethan
replies.text: You need to get you facts straight. They didn't lie the lies came from former president Bush when the war start in Iraq and so many lives was lost

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Rejoice that Hillary wont be starting an Iraq war. Trump knows nothing. He really should Not be running.

replies.author: Kimberly
replies.text: That is how an idiot reasons. You need deliverance from God so that your blinded eyes can open

replies.author: Zoe
replies.text: I see you get your facts from Breitbart , it's a right wing hate propaganda that draws pig farmers like you. Don't go there, don't get sucked in by breitbart . It's a joke on you. As a farmer you live off the government . Vote democratic for your own survival
